alert.note: Alert for Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 12:02AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN ROSS COUNTY THROUGH 1230 AM EDT... At 1202 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Chillicothe, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Londonderry, Massieville, Mooresville, Scioto Trail State Park and Richmond Dale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
